text: This is a list of Bosnian European Film Award winners and nominees. This list details the performances of Bosnian actors, actresses, and films that have either been submitted or nominated for, or have won, a European Film Award. ==Main categories== {| class="wikitable" width="100%" cellpadding="5" |- !width="5%"|Year !width="18%"|Award !width="28%"|Recipient !width="10%"|Status !width="38%"|Note |- | 1997 || Best Film || The Perfect Circle || || |- | 1997 || Best Screenwriter || Ademir Kenović, Abdulah Sidran for The Perfect Circle || || |- |2001 ||Best Screenwriter || Danis Tanović for No Man's Land || || |- |2001 ||Best Actor || Branko Đurić for No Man's Land || || |- | 2002 || Best Short Film || 10 minutes || || |- |2003 ||European Discovery || Fuse || || Bosnian-Austrian-Turkish-French co- production |- | 2005 || Best Film || Grbavica: Esma's Secret || || Bosnian- Austrian-German-Croatian co-production |- | 2005 || Best Short Film || Prva plata || || |- | 2008 || European Discovery || Snow || || Bosnian-German- French-Iranian co-production |- | 2008 || Best Short Film || Tolerantia || || |- |} ***Nominations - 8 ***Wins - 2 ==See also== * List of Bosnian submissions for the Academy Award for Best Foreign Language Film ==External links== * Nominees and winners at the European Film Academy website European Film Awards Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Lists of Bosnia and Herzegovina media|European Film Awards] European Film Awards
title: List of Bosnian European Film Award winners and nominees
